parameters.name: ArrayProperties
parameters.description:
The configuration of the array job.

>  The value of an array job index is passed to a serverless job container through the environment variable `EHPC_ARRAY_TASK_ID`. Users can access the container from business programs.

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description:
The cluster ID.

You can call the [ListClusters](~~87116~~) operation to query the cluster ID.

parameters.name: Container
parameters.description: The properties of the Serverless job container.

parameters.name: Cpu
parameters.description: The vCPU size of the serverless job container. Unit: cores.

parameters.name: DependsOn
parameters.description: The dependencies of the serverless job.

parameters.name: EphemeralStorage
parameters.description:
The size of the temporary storage space added to the serverless job container. Unit: GiB.

>  By default, a space of 30 GiB is provided free of charge. If you require a larger space, you can pass this parameter to specify your required space size.

parameters.name: InstanceType
parameters.description: The Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance types used by the serverless job container.

parameters.name: JobName
parameters.description:
The name of the serverless job.

>  The name can contain lowercase letters, digits, and hyphens (-). It cannot start or end with a hyphen.

parameters.name: JobPriority
parameters.description: The scheduling priority of the serverless job. Valid values: 0 to 999. A greater value indicates a higher priority.

parameters.name: Memory
parameters.description: The memory size of the serverless job container. Unit: GiB.

parameters.name: RamRoleName
parameters.description: The Resource Access Manamement (RAM) role that is associated with the Serverless job container.

parameters.name: RetryStrategy
parameters.description: The retry policy of the serverless job.

parameters.name: SpotPriceLimit
parameters.description:
The maximum hourly price of the preemptible elastic container instance. The value can be accurate to three decimal places.

If you set SpotStrategy to SpotWithPriceLimit, you must specify the SpotPriceLimit parameter.

parameters.name: SpotStrategy
parameters.description:
The bidding policy of the ECS instances. Valid values:

*   NoSpot: The instance is created as a pay-as-you-go instance.
*   SpotWithPriceLimit: The instance is created as a preemptible instance for which you specify the maximum hourly price.
*   SpotAsPriceGo: The instance is created as a preemptible instance for which the market price at the time of purchase is automatically used as the bid price.

Default value: NoSpot.

parameters.name: Timeout
parameters.description: The validity period of the serverless job. After the validity period expires, the job is forcibly terminated. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: VSwitchId
parameters.description: The IDs of the vSwitches to which the serverless job container belongs.
